business-description:
Converged Networks comprises experienced professionals who take a consultative approach to designing and installing holistic communications solutions for our customers. We began operations in 2001 and have grown year-over-year thanks to the awesome customers we support. We are very much a relationship-oriented organization. 

**Lightspeed Systems** is a network security software company that specializes in large K-12 networks.  **Converged Networks became Lightspeed Systems' largest dealer in the country**gree in 2006 and has maintained this position each year since 2006.  

Converged Networks was a finalist in the US Chamber of Commerce "Small Business of the Year" award.  

It is an honor to have been nominated for this prestigious award. 

We view it as our job to remain laser-focused on your voice and data communications needs so you can stay focused on your business.  

Simply put, Converged Networks measures its success on the individual successes of our clients.

The voice and data communications business has undergone a major transformation. The Internet Protocol is the catalyst for this transformation.  Voice communications over the Internet Protocol, known as "IP Telephony", or "VoIP" is the next generation of communications solutions, and the way businesses and other organizations have already begun to communicate.  This is no longer considered the future - it's happening now!   

Converged Networks, LLC represents the leaders in communications solutions for the medium to large commercial enterprise as well as K-12 school districts and and other public sector organizations. With solutions from Aerohive, ShoreTel, AVAYA, Extreme Networks, Juniper Networks, Polycom and Lightspeed Systems, we bring our customers the very best in end-to-end converged communications solutions and network security. 

Please email sales@convergednetworksllc.com or call us at 843-571-6400 anytime.  We are here to serve you.
competitive-advantage:
The secret to optimizing your communications is the effective application of the right technology to the right business need.  From Contact Center technology to Messaging Solutions to Converged Voice and Data Networks - both Local Area Networks (LAN) and Wide Area Networks (WAN), to network security, we are only a call or a click away - for all of your communications needs.  Although we represent leading voice and data communications companies, first and foremost we represent you and the needs of your business!  

Today's businesses need smart, honest, knowledgeable communications professionals who solve business problems through efficient application of technology. This is what your business deserves.  It's what we do.  We do it professionally and responsibly, and appreciate the opportunity to do it for your business!
